# Hushbay 睡眠岛

> Hushbay is a sound-driven sleep app: natural soundscapes, auto-stop on sleep onset, snore detection, and tinnitus relief. This website provides free sound previews; full versions are available in the iOS app.

## Key Pages
- Homepage (中文): https://sleepisland.org/
- Homepage (English): https://sleepisland.org/en/
- App Info: https://sleepisland.org/app/
- Sound Resources: https://sleepisland.org/resources/
- Sleep Guides: https://sleepisland.org/guides/
- Tinnitus Relief: https://sleepisland.org/tinnitus-relief/
- Snore Detection: https://sleepisland.org/snore-detection/
- FAQ: https://sleepisland.org/faq/

## Sound Resources (Free Web Preview)
- Rain & Fireplace: https://sleepisland.org/resources/rain-fireplace/
- Lake Raindrops: https://sleepisland.org/resources/lake-rain/
- Relaxing Rain: https://sleepisland.org/resources/relaxing-rain/
- Gentle Night Rain: https://sleepisland.org/resources/gentle-night-rain/
- Rain & Forest Stream: https://sleepisland.org/resources/rain-forest-stream/
- Thunderstorm on Tin Roof: https://sleepisland.org/resources/thunderstorm/
- Tropical Rainforest: https://sleepisland.org/resources/tropical-rainforest/
- Deep Sea Bubbles: https://sleepisland.org/resources/deep-sea-bubbles/
- Blizzard: https://sleepisland.org/resources/blizzard/
- Winter Cave Fireplace: https://sleepisland.org/resources/winter-cave-fireplace/
- Cricket Sounds (Tinnitus Relief): https://sleepisland.org/resources/cricket-sounds/
- Crickets & Insects (Tinnitus Relief): https://sleepisland.org/resources/crickets-insects/
- Pink Noise: https://sleepisland.org/resources/pink-noise/

## Guides
- How to Fall Asleep Faster with White Noise: https://sleepisland.org/guides/white-noise-sleep/
- Best Soundscape Combinations for Sleep: https://sleepisland.org/guides/best-sleep-soundscapes/
- Auto-Stop on Sleep: Why It Matters: https://sleepisland.org/guides/auto-stop-sleep/
- Sound Masking Therapy for Tinnitus: https://sleepisland.org/guides/sound-masking-tinnitus/
- Sleep Strategies for Tinnitus Sufferers: https://sleepisland.org/guides/tinnitus-sleep-strategies/
- How to Choose Tinnitus Relief Sounds: https://sleepisland.org/guides/choose-tinnitus-sounds/
- How to Detect Snoring with Your Phone: https://sleepisland.org/guides/detect-snoring-phone/
- Snoring Levels and Health Risks: https://sleepisland.org/guides/snoring-levels-health/

- iOS App Store: https://apps.apple.com/app/id6747609991
